Plain Text: Provide your organisation’s total expected development and humanitarian spend for the current and (where possible) following three years. Budgets should preferably be entered for each three month (quarter) period. Budget time periods should not overlap or cover a period of more than twelve months. Click here for more information.
Text with HTML tag:

Plain Text: Select a status that best describes this budget: (1) indicative - a non-binding estimate for the described budget. (2) committed - a binding agreement for the described budget. If no status is selected, the budget is assumed to be indicative.

Plain Text: You can provide information on your organisation's past spending on humanitarian and development work. This is known as ‘total expenditure’ and IATI recommends, where possible, that your organisation reports its total expenditure for each of the past three years. An expenditure period must not be longer than one year. Click here for more information
